thread.title: Recipes: Kebabs are a great family dinner for the end of summer
thread.title_full: Recipes: Kebabs are a great family dinner for the end of summer - The Globe and Mail

author: LUCY WAVERMAN
title: Recipes: Kebabs are a great family dinner for the end of summer
text:
A A Welcome to the Kebab Bar. With the kids going back to school, everyone appreciates a fun family dinner before the big day. Children of all ages enjoy interactive food and it is particularly good for picky eaters. They like a bit of control in making their own food selections. The recipe for this dinner involves lots of choice and is topped off with a kid-pleasing dessert, chocolate fondue.
Weekend Menu
Kebabs
Dipping Sauces
Coconut curry dipping sauce
Chimichurri dipping sauce
Dessert
Chocolate fondue
